name: markdown-it-video
description: Markdown-it plugin to embed a hosted videos

scripts.test: npm run test-lint && npm run test-spec
scripts.test-ci: npm run test-lint && npm run test-coverage-ci
scripts.test-coverage-ci: rm -rf coverage && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec --compilers js:babel-register && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | node ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: brianjgeiger
